metadata.title: CVE-2020-36775 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:fix to avoid potential deadlock Using f2fs_trylock_op() inf2fs_write_compressed_pages() to avoid potential deadlock like we did inf2fs_write_single_data_page().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
